text:
Hi,

I think there are 2 useless template:
  Building a Web Test Plan
  Building an Advanced Web Test Plan

I have never seen people to use it and use the recorder to create web test plan is a better solution.
People whose want to create it manually have the knowledge to do it without recorder
In addition the document is enough

Patch in https://github.com/apache/jmeter/pull/92 and https://github.com/apache/jmeter/pull/93

Antonio
creator: ra0077@gmail.com

text: As per Github discussion some users use it.
creator: p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com
